Content: COLOMBO (News 1st) –  Former Navy Commander Admiral Wasantha Karanagoda was summoned before the Criminal Investigation Department for the fourth time today (April 04). Wasantha Karanagoda arrived at the CID to provide a statement into the abduction and forced disappearance of eleven youth in Colombo using a white van in 2008. Police noted that the former Navy Commander who arrived at the CID earlier today(April 04)is currently providing his statement.
